text: "Famous Last Words" is a song by the British group Tears for Fears, originally released on their 1989 album The Seeds of Love. It was released (by the record company without the band's involvement) as the fourth and final single from the album in 1990 and peaked at #83 in the UK. ==Track listing== 7" single (IDEA 15) # "Famous Last Words" # "Mothers Talk" (US remix) CD Single (IDECD 15) # "Famous Last Words" # "Mothers Talk" (US remix) # "Listen" Category:1990 singles Category:Tears for Fears songs Category:Songs written by Roland Orzabal Category:Songs written by Nicky Holland Category:1989 songs Category:Fontana Records singles Category:Songs about nuclear war and weapons
title: Famous Last Words (Tears for Fears song)
